# annotations

**Instance Property**

Returns an array containing the page’s annotations.

## Declaration

```swift
var annotations: [PDFAnnotation] { get }
```

## Discussion

The elements of the array will most likely be typed to subclasses of the [doc://com.apple.pdfkit/documentation/PDFKit/PDFAnnotation] class.

## Working with Annotations

- **displaysAnnotations**: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether annotations are displayed for the page.
- **addAnnotation(_:)**: Adds the specified annotation object to the page.
- **removeAnnotation(_:)**: Removes the specified annotation from the page.
- **annotation(at:)**: Returns the annotation, if there is one, at the specified point.
